situation.title: Carp selling
situation.meta_description: regime of carp selling Christmas Covid-19

content.processed:
Recommendations

The sale of Christmas carps is currently not regulated by any measure.

To reduce the risk of infection, keep spacing in the queue, keep face masks and keep your distance from the seller.

Some cities are restricting Christmas markets. So, if you used to buy aÂ carp traditionally on the markets, there may not be any carp stand there this year.
